task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:smooth_sandstone facing:A positions:[start:[-22 -60 0] end:[-8 -60 0]]]",
    "[material:smooth_sandstone facing:A positions:[start:[-22 -60 -1] end:[-8 -60 -1]]]",
    "[material:smooth_sandstone facing:A positions:[start:[-22 -60 1] end:[-8 -60 1]]]"
]

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***

Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[[-10 -60 1] [-9 -60 1]]]",
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[[-10 -60 0] [-9 -60 0]]]",
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[start:[-11 -60 -1] end:[-11 -60 2]]]",
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[[-10 -60 2] [-9 -60 2]]]",
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[start:[-8 -60 -1] end:[-8 -60 2]]]",
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[[-10 -60 -1] [-9 -60 -1]]]",
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[start:[-11 -59 -1] end:[-11 -59 2]]]",
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[[-10 -59 2] [-9 -59 2]]]",
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[[-10 -59 -1] [-9 -59 -1]]]",

]

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[

Since the attempt to withdraw dark oak fence from the chest was unsuccessful, agent1 should seek alternative ways to obtain the required materials.

Here are the steps agent1 should take:

1. **Seek Help from Other Agents**: Since agent1 is willing to seek help, they can ask other team members if they have dark oak fence available or if they can help find it.

2. **Check Other Chests**: If there are other chests nearby, agent1 can check those for dark oak fence.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:grass_block facing:A positions:[[-10 -60 -2] [-10 -60 0] [-12 -60 1] [-12 -60 2] [-12 -60 3] [-11 -60 3] [-9 -60 3] [-8 -60 3]]]",
    "[material:grass_block facing:A positions:[[-10 -60 1] [-10 -60 2] [-10 -60 3]]]",
    "[material:grass_block facing:A positions:[start:[-9 -60 -2] end:[-9 -60 1]]]",
    "[material:grass_block facing:A positions:[[-11 -60 -1] [-11 -60 0] [-11 -60 1] [-11 -60 2]]]",
    "[material:grass_block facing:A positions:[start:[-8 -60 -2] end:[-8 -60 2]]]",
    "material: dirt facing: A position: [-12, -60, 0]",
    "[material:grass_block facing:A positions:[[-12 -60 -2] [-11 -60 -2] [-12 -60 -1]]]",

2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.

*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:farmland facing:A positions:[[-11 -60 1] [-10 -60 1] [-10 -60 2] [-9 -60 2]]]",

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-9 -60 -7] end:[-9 -60 7]]]",
    "[material:dirt facing:A positions:[[-9 -60 -8] [-8 -60 -1] [-8 -60 0] [-8 -60 1] [-8 -60 2] [-9 -60 8]]]",

This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[start:[-11 -60 -2] end:[-11 -60 3]]]",
    "[material:cobblestone facing:A positions:[start:[-13 -60 -3] end:[-9 -60 -3] start:[-13 -60 -2] end:[-9 -60 -2] start:[-13 -60 -1] end:[-9 -60 -1] start:[-13 -60 0] end:[-9 -60 0] start:[-13 -60 1] end:[-9 -60 1] start:[-13 -60 2] end:[-9 -60 2] start:[-13 -60 3] end:[-9 -60 3]]]",

task_assignments.agent1:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[

Result from the model:To overcome the current obstacles and access the chest, I will follow the plan of action outlined earlier. Since I have 41 dirt blocks in my inventory, I will create a staircase leading up to the chest. 

### Steps to Execute:
1. **Assess the Environment**: I will check the nearby blocks to find a suitable location to place the dirt blocks for a staircase.
2. **Build a Staircase**: I will place dirt blocks in a staircase formation to reach the chest.

Let's start by placing the dirt blocks to create a staircase. Given my current position at `[-5, -51, 6]`, I will place dirt blocks at the following coordinates to create a staircase:

- `[-5, -50, 6]`
- `[-5, -49, 6]`
- `[-5, -48, 6]`
- `[-5, -47, 6]`
- `[-5, -46, 6]`

I will proceed to place the dirt blocks at these coordinates.

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-14 -60 -6] end:[-14 -60 6]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-15 -60 -5] end:[-15 -60 6]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-16 -60 -1] end:[-16 -60 1]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-16 -60 -4] end:[-16 -60 -2]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[[-16 -60 -5] [-16 -60 2] [-16 -60 3]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-16 -60 4] end:[-16 -60 6]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[[-16 -60 -6] [-15 -60 -6] [-16 -60 7]]]",
    "[material:farmland facing:A positions:[[-9 -60 -7] [-10 -60 -6] [-9 -60 -6] [-8 -60 -6] [-10 -60 -5] [-8 -60 -5] [-9 -60 -4] [-8 -60 -4]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[start:[-16 -60 -7] end:[-14 -60 -7] start:[-16 -60 8] end:[-14 -60 8]]]",
    "[material:dirt facing:A positions:[start:[-15 -60 -7] end:[-15 -60 8]]]",
    "[material:dirt_path facing:A positions:[[-15 -60 7] [-14 -60 7]]]"
]

task:
This is in the game of Minecraft. Build a building according to a blueprint. The blueprint contains necessary information about the material, facing direction and position of each block.
*** The minecraft knowledge card ***
Here are some knowledge about minecraft:
1. The minecraft world x,z is the horizontal coordinate, y is the vertical coordinate. y=-61 is the ground level.
2. You can use the tool or empty hand to dig the block, and place the block to the world.
3. A block cannot be directly placed in the air. When being placed, there must be at least one existing block next to it.
4. A block can exist in the air by removing all the other blocks attached to it.
5. You can find the item in the chest. Item in the chest can not directly be seen or used, take it out and use it or equip it.
6. If their is no items in the chest, maybe you can find the item at other chest or get it from other agent or dig it up or craft it.
7. One bucket can hold one item, if you want to get more items, you need to get more buckets at first.
8. You are in a team with other agents, you can try to find the item from other agents, and do not change the blocks other agents placed without permission.
*** The blueprint ***
[
